system.description:
Effect: If the user is being controlled by Tastugiri's Commander ability, this attack raises a Stat stage by +1 for 5 activations on hit, depending on Tatsugiri's forme:
Curly Form - ATK
Droopy Forme - DEF
Stretchy Forme - SPD

actions.name: Order Up
